name: Bone Lure
description: The Bone Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Bone Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.
